data.name: Desktop Animi
data.detailed_description:
Desktop Animi is a cute and stress-relieving desktop pet that not only interacts according to the player's behavior, it also reacts differently due to the flow of real time.

After careful nourishing by players, it will also evolve into other Animi with different characteristics. Let this cute little friend accompany you through every stressful and computer dependent day.
data.about_the_game:
Desktop Animi is a cute and stress-relieving desktop pet that not only interacts according to the player's behavior, it also reacts differently due to the flow of real time.

After careful nourishing by players, it will also evolve into other Animi with different characteristics. Let this cute little friend accompany you through every stressful and computer dependent day.
data.short_description: Desktop Animi is a cute and relaxing desktop pet, they will interact with the player's behavior according to real time, and even grow into new forms with different characteristics. Let Desktop Animi accompany you through daily life in this high-pressure modern life at the price of a coffee.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Ukrainian, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
